function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential impediment to the implementation of the EGD due to COVID-19","Impact":"Delay in negotiations and implementation, disincentivized Member States","Mitigation":"Incorporate EGD actions into COVID-19 recovery effort, prioritize EGD and climate action in economic recovery","Technologies":"N/A","People":"European Union, Member States","Owner":"European Commission, Member States"},{"Description":"Delayed initiatives and assessments due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential setback in achieving emission reduction targets for 2030","Mitigation":"Retain schedule for key priorities, propose increases to the 2030 emissions target, review state aid laws, reform and strengthen Emissions Trading Scheme","Technologies":"N/A","People":"European Union, Member States","Owner":"European Commission, Germany, France"},{"Description":"Temporary lifting of state aid rules as part of initial economic response to COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Changes in longstanding EU policy for state aid","Mitigation":"Monitor and assess the impact of lifted state aid rules, consider adjustments to policy as needed","Technologies":"N/A","People":"European Union, Member States","Owner":"European Commission"}]}
